A Little to the Left: Stars

ios.subtitle: The moving story of a lifetime

editorialNotes.standard: Movings a drag!Relocate tothis satisfying puzzler in which you unpack boxes filled with all sorts of goodies.

After a long day at work, its bath time! But Swampys shower is broken and he needs your help to guide the water to him. Navigate a path through the dirt past contraptions and obstacles to get every drop to fill the bath.

editorialNotes.short: Unravel family secrets on a remote island cursed by plagues in this dark puzzle adventure.

editorialNotes.tagline: Team up to solve the puzzles

editorialNotes.standard: Enigmatic settings and storytelling enrich the mysteries of Leonardo da Vincis gadgetry in this escape room puzzle series fantastic conclusion.

name: Tick Tock: A Tale for Two

editorialNotes.standard: Mesmerising from start to finish, Monument Valley offers a world of uncanny beauty and constant wonder. To help a princess proceed on her mysterious quest, youll face ingenious puzzles that involve lifting and spinning the environment in seemingly impossible ways. Its a mind-bending journey filled with the joy of discovery, making Ustwos adventure a must-play for gamers of every experience level.
editorialNotes.short: Traverse mind-bending levels that are structurally impossible

editorialNotes.standard: Well take any excuse to visit Deus Exs techno dystopia, but experiencing it as a turn-based puzzler is a true delight. What amazes us most is how Deus Ex GO re-creates the action-RPG series trademark features while preserving the stunning visuals and clever strategy of Lara Croft GO and Hitman GO. We got chills stomping guards with vicious takedowns and altering levels by hacking them. Theres even an intriguing story (pitting Adam Jensen against heavily armed terrorists) to keep you going.

editorialNotes.short: Discover a memorable story full of humour and charming characters.
editorialNotes.tagline: Discover a memorable story full of humour
Jump in and save the ninjas!

editorialNotes.standard: A fascinating reinvention of a longtime videogame franchise, Hitman GO takes familiar elements of stealth and assassination and reinterprets them as a wondrously stylised, turn-based boardgame. Each mission presents characters and scenessome from previous Hitman gamesas a sleek diorama, blending old and new to create an innovative experience. Even with helpful distractions and places to hide, inching toward your targets a step at a time demands keen strategy, and trying to pull off optional mission objectives quickly becomes an irresistible obsession.

editorialNotes.short: Brilliant puzzle designs and a haunting atmosphere make this unforgettable
editorialNotes.standard: Now heres how you build a sequel! With The Room Three, Fireproof Games kept everything we love about this seriesits chilling atmosphere, mind-bending puzzles and beautiful visualswhile making masterful enhancements. The story continues with trials set by a creepy new nemesis, The Craftsman. As you explore huge areas and tiny ones, the challenges feel increasingly epic, and a better-than-ever hint system ensures that finding solutions is super-rewarding.

ios.subtitle: A game about life, loss & hope

editorialNotes.standard: An Apple Design Award winner, this moving puzzler proves sometimes the best stories dont need words. Developer Broken Rules has created a hand-drawn world that bubbles with whimsy and heart. Altering the landscape to reveal hidden paths makes for fascinating, peaceful gameplay. We love exploring the storybook settings and uncovering each touching memory. Its unforgettable, and wed move mountains just to relive the experience.
editorialNotes.short: Experience the meditative voyage of a gentleman puzzling through his past.

ios.subtitle: Roll the ball from cat to cat

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

name: I Have No Mouth And I Must Scream

ios.subtitle: All our puzzles in one app!

editorialNotes.standard: Part platformer, part puzzler, Edge has infatuated gamers almost since the opening of the App Store. Guide a nimble cube around the narrow ledges and ever-shifting corridors of a treacherous 3D world, unlocking secrets and collecting items without falling into space. Stylishly minimalist visuals and a slick electronic soundtrack make Edges mix of path-finding challenges and pitfall-avoiding thrills easy to get lost in. Its dozens of levels of perfectly balanced gameplay redefine how much fun simplicity and sophistication can be.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: Beautiful, challenging, and always inventive - these brilliant puzzles will really test you.
An immersive world filled with ancient ruins and advanced technology.

editorialNotes.standard: Help a curious monster explore an archipelago by building bridges in this charming, challenging puzzler.

ios.subtitle: A story of beauty and illusion

editorialNotes.standard: We couldnt wait to go back to the land of twisty towers and uncanny beautyand this sequel didnt let us down. With its striking colours and level design, its even more stunning than the first game. New elements like light beams and controlling two characters make the puzzles even trickier. The bond between that mother and child is what well remember most, thoughtheir relationship moved us in a way few games do.
editorialNotes.short: An unforgettable adventure full of challenging puzzles and gorgeous visuals.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Imagine WALLE directed by Tim Burtonthats the weird, wonderful world of Machinarium. But this cute robots quest for love combines tons more influenceslike point-and-click adventures, hidden-object puzzlers, and comic booksfor a truly unique experience. Challenging but full of awesome aha! moments, its an artistic odyssey that looks amazing on iPhone, iPad, or Apple TV.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: Geneva Hodgson: Story editor, Donut County

name: Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons

editorialNotes.tagline: Two heads are better than one

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Put a little boo in your botany by concocting herbal remedies for odd supernatural ailments in this eerie puzzle-adventure.
With relaxed swapping rules and charming graphics, this surprisingly slick match-3 puzzler makes the genre feel fresh again.

They say dont wake sleeping dogs, but poor Mimpi has been having some very weird dreams. From laboratories to forests to dangerous, debris-strewn waters, the only similarity between Mimpis dreamscapes is how fun they are to navigate. Each stage is filled with puzzles to solve and environmental objects to fiddle with. Youll knock down power lines, steer clouds, push suitcases, and (of course!) collect bones on your exhilarating journey through dreamlands.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Limbo is a gripping blend of stark, haunting landscapes, bizarre characters and unsettling sounds. With clever puzzle design, an intriguing narrative and an excellent touch-screen control system, its as rewarding to play as it is interesting to look at and listen to.
editorialNotes.short: Dark, haunting, beautiful. This'll stay with you long after it's over.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: You might get stuck the first time you play Gorogoa. But once the gears of your brain settle into the right configurations, youll see how smart this mix of art and perspective really is. Layers pile upon layers, doors transport you between realities, strange creatures and wild environments blend together into a fascinating interactive collage youll want to peel apart to discover what lies underneath.
